lead_paragraph: EVANS--Harold M. You are in our thoughts and hearts every day. Time hasn't diminished the void left by your absence. Modest man; gigantic legacy. Love, Your Family 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  EVANS, HAROLD M
